participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, Emily enjoys expressing herself through dance and has a fondness for classic music.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Passionate about music and tech, James is an aspiring producer who loves to experiment with different genres.
participant_2.background: i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza. i listen to rap music. i produce music for artists. my pet's name is charlie.
